channel.title: github on INBO Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in github on INBO Tutorials

item.title: Styleguide new git repositories
item.description: Naming Use lowercase for repository, directory, and file names. For R-related files, use uppercase R. https://github.com/inbo/data-publication ../tutorials/gis/leaflet-R.Rmd Use dash (-) to separate words in repository, directory, and file names. Don’t use underscores. .../datasets/bird-tracking-gull-occurrences/mapping/dwc-occurrence.sql READMEs
